name: Loopomotive (jpiolho, SaraFilipa)
description:
Welcome to Loopomotive, a game where you control a train that never stops!

Your goal is to not hit any cars while stuck in the loop. You can accelerate or slow down the train, but never stop it.

You continue to the next level when a pre-determined number of cars has made their way safely out of the screen. You can follow the countdown on the top-right corner. You lose once you hit a car.

The game has 3 levels, so try to make it until the end!

W or ↑ - Accelerate
S or ↓ - Slow down

Thank you for playing! We hope you enjoy the game.
